summary: During World War I in 1918, a pigeon and his friends spring into action.

Marino|Zak Morgan|Tessa Munro|Shila Ommi|Luis Posada|Bill Rude|Napoleon Ryan|Tyler Shamy|Lloyd F. Booth Shankley|Jonathan Luke Thomas|Nicole Tompkins|Núria Trifol|Alfonso Vallés|Mike Vaughn|Gerold Wunstel|Chris Wyatt|Sasha Zaripov
title: Cher Ami... ¡y yo!
